channel.title: Help me please - This problam has been bugging me for weeks-
channel.description:
Everytime i open up moparscape it says -exception in thread "main£ java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: Bot press any key to continue. and when i open up the jar - it loads up but it doesn't let me log in. and at the bottom it says Loaded 0 random handlers #Loading controllers
Please help this stupid thing has been bugging me for long. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2007, 11:20:01 AM[/size][hr]Please help. i have done everything . i have extracted the files and copied the files from bin to the moparfile and i have downloaded the latest java and it doesn't work

item.title: Help me please - This problam has been bugging me for weeks-
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I have had that problem it is a java based error your java is not compiling properly and so your compiler nor your run will work . You are the only one who can resolve the problem.
